@graph.name: Somatic-Variant-Discovery-from-WES-Data-Using-Control-FREEC
@graph.description:
This workflow is created as part of a tutorial listed on GTN. The workflow shows the steps in human copy number variance detection using the Contrl_FREEC tool. 

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Somatic Variant Discovery from WES Data Using Control-FREEC](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/variant-analysis/tutorials/somatic-variant-discovery/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
